CanMakePaymentEvent.summary: NOTE Experimental The CanMakePaymentEvent interface of the {{domxref("Payment Handler API", "", "", "nocode")}} is the event object for the event, fired on a payment app's service worker to check whether it is ready to handle a payment. Specifically, it is fired when the merchant website calls the constructor.
